K12D0585=D0941_H0756:138a-0: @138a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0585=D0941_H0756:138a-1: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12D0585=D0941_H0756:138a-2: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa na n'am/
K12D0585=D0941_H0756:138a-3: aom ki ni ki ni ta th'a ga ta au da bha ba sh'ante ba ra de /
K12D0585=D0941_H0756:138a-4: autta ma autta ma ta th'a ga ta /
K12D0585=D0941_H0756:138a-5: aud bha ba h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0585=D0941_H0756:138b-0: 'di bzung bas 'phags @138b sdong po bkod pa'i mdo
K12D0585=D0941_H0756:138b-1: thams cad rdzogs par bklags shing kha ton du byas
K12D0585=D0941_H0756:138b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro //
K12D0585=D0941_H0756:138b-4: phyag rgya rnams kyang shes par 'gyur /
